389:1: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat–kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan,
389:4: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam ||
389:5: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha–kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni?
389:7: bhagavānāha–yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
389:19: tadyathā–hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam |
389:22: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
389:24: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–kasya nimittāni bhagavan?
389:25: bhagavānāha–eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
389:27: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati |
389:28: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
389:29: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma–imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni |
389:30: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca |
389:31: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni |
389:32: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute–kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu?
389:39: mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca |
389:40: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ |
389:42: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ ||
389:43: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
